C2PA Manifest Inspector

‚ö†Ô∏è Developer Tool ‚Äî This inspector uses the official C2PA library to read manifest data, but this is not a certified C2PA validator product. For production validation, use Content Credentials Verify or other certified tools.

Upload a C2PA-signed image to inspect its manifest, assertions, and provenance chain. Great for testing how tampering or modifications affect the signature.

SSL.com C2PA Developer Tool ‚Ä¢ Test certificate issuance, signing, and verification APIs

TSA Endpoints (C2PA Compliant):
ECC (default): https://api.c2patool.io/api/v1/timestamps/ecc
RSA: https://api.c2patool.io/api/v1/timestamps/rsa

Trust Bundles:
ECC: https://api.c2patool.io/repository/C2PA-ECC-TRUST-BUNDLE.pem
RSA: https://api.c2patool.io/repository/C2PA-RSA-TRUST-BUNDLE.pem
